verses.roman:
vaikuṇṭha-bāhire eka jyotir-maya maṇḍala
kṛṣṇera aṅgera prabhā, parama ujjvala

synonyms: vaikuṇṭha-bāhire—outside the Vaikuṇṭhalokas; eka—one; jyotiḥ-maya maṇḍala—the atmosphere of the glowing effulgence; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; aṅgera—of the body; prabhā—rays; parama—supremely; ujjvala—bright.
translation: Outside the Vaikuṇṭha planets is the atmosphere of the glowing effulgence, which consists of the supremely bright rays of the body of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
